build a list of 15-25 phrases
use buying intent: ‚Äúalternative to‚Äù, ‚Äúpricing‚Äù, ‚Äúbest way to‚Äù

trendNews.title: Introducing OpenAI Frontier
trendNews.summary: OpenAI announced Frontier, an enterprise platform to build, deploy, and manage AI agents (‚ÄúAI coworkers‚Äù) with shared business context, evaluation/optimization, and explicit identity/permissions/boundaries, designed to run across existing systems using open standards and support production-grade rollout beyond isolated pilots.
trendNews.whyItMatters: Signals a shift from ad-hoc agent scripts to full lifecycle agent operations (context + governance + deployment), which is exactly what teams need to automate cross-system workflows reliably at enterprise scale.

trendNews.title: Agents in OneDrive Now Generally Available: Your AI Assistant Built with Your Own Content
trendNews.summary: Microsoft announced general availability of Agents in OneDrive, enabling users to create an agent grounded in their own OneDrive files/folders to answer questions across multiple documents, summarize key takeaways, and surface action items (owners, deadlines, risks) while preserving shared project context.
trendNews.whyItMatters: Makes ‚Äúcontextual project agents‚Äù a native artifact in enterprise file workflows, lowering the barrier to automating knowledge-work routines (status updates, Q&A, decision tracking) without standing up a separate orchestration stack.

trendNews.title: Anthropic‚Äôs new Cowork tool offers Claude Code without the code
trendNews.summary: Anthropic introduced Cowork, a Claude Desktop feature positioned as a more accessible, folder-scoped version of Claude Code that can read/modify files inside a designated directory and execute multi-step tasks via chat instructions, initially released as a research preview with restricted access.
trendNews.whyItMatters: Pushes agentic workflow automation onto the desktop for non-technical users, while highlighting the emerging best practice of sandboxed, permissioned execution (to mitigate risks like prompt injection and unintended file actions).
